title: Gone in 60 seconds = Gone in sixty seconds
creator_credit: Dominic Sena, Mike Stenson, Jerry Bruckheimer and Touchstone Pictures
brief_description: In this remake of H. B. Halicki’s cult favourite, Nicholas Cage stars as Randall “Memphis” Raines, a master car thief whose desire to get out of the game is compromised when his brother becomes embroiled with a dangerous criminal. To save his brother Memphis must steal fifty cars in one evening, a task he undertakes with the aid of a motley crew. At the same time, another gang is undertaking the same challenge and the police are hot on the trail of both. Cast also includes Angelina Jolie, Giovanni Ribisi, Will Patton, Robert Duvall.
